entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 3:34 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 7.1°C
Wind: SSW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming east 20 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
